Class TaskDaoTest

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.persistence.TaskDaoTest
public class TaskDaoTest extends Object
JUnit 4 CRUD tests for EmbeddedDerbyTasksDAO.

Execution order is fixed by method name to make assertions deterministic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TaskDaoTest()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    afterAll()
    Shuts down the embedded Derby DAO after all tests complete.
    void
    setUp()
    Initializes the DAO and clears all rows before each test.
    void
    test01_add_and_list()
    Verifies that adding a task assigns an id and that listing returns the inserted task with expected field values.
    void
    test02_get_by_id_and_not_found()
    Verifies retrieval by id and not-found behavior.
    void
    test03_add_with_explicit_id_and_duplicate()
    Verifies insertion with an explicit id and duplicate key rejection.
    void
    test04_update_existing_and_missing()
    Verifies updating an existing row and failure when updating a missing id.
    void
    test05_delete_single_and_missing()
    Verifies single-row deletion and not-found behavior on repeated deletion.
    void
    test06_delete_all()
    Verifies bulk deletion clears the table.
